whodonedidit.skeletons

Class PlayerMessenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • whodonedidit.skeletons.PlayerMessenger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageListener

    public class PlayerMessenger
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageListener
    PlayerMessenger is used to facilitate communication between the player and the game manager. If the the player messenger is online the messages will be sent through the server to the game messenger. If the player messenger is offline the messages will be delivered directly to the game messenger.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Client client
      Client that is connected to the game server.
      private GameMessenger gameMessenger
      A reference to the game messenger to communicate with
      private boolean isOnline
      True if the game is online and messages are going though the server and false if the game is offline single player
      private Player player
      The player that the player messenger is representing

      Constructs an online messenger with an associated client
